description: This file contains unit tests for key-value type classes, specifically testing the functionality of KeyValueType and TextKeyValueType templates, using the Google Test framework.

classes.name: KeyValueType
classes.description: Template class used to define key-value pairs with comparison and key-value access methods.

classes.name: TextKeyValueType
classes.description: Template class for key-value pairs involving TextFragment with case sensitivity options.

classes.name: TextFragment
classes.description: Class representing a text fragment, used as key or value in key-value pairs.

classes.name: OptionalType
classes.description: Template class for optional values, wrapping TextFragment in this test.

methods.name: KeyValueType<string, string>::operator==
methods.description: Equality comparison operator for key-value pairs.

methods.name: KeyValueType<string, string>::operator!=
methods.description: Inequality comparison operator for key-value pairs.

methods.name: KeyValueType<string, string>::Key
methods.description: Returns the key component of the key-value pair.

methods.name: KeyValueType<string, string>::Value
methods.description: Returns the value component of the key-value pair.

methods.name: KeyValueType<string, string>::IsKey
methods.description: Checks if a given string matches the key.

methods.name: TextKeyValueType<CASESENSITIVE, TextFragment>
methods.description: Constructor for TextKeyValueType with case sensitivity parameter.

methods.name: TextKeyValueType<CASESENSITIVE, TextFragment>
methods.description: Constructor with key and value for TextKeyValueType.
